judul: Python Web Scraping: Extracting Data with BeautifulSoup
konten: BeautifulSoup is a Python library used for web scraping purposes. It simplifies the process of extracting data from HTML...

contoh.isi:
# Example of web scraping with BeautifulSoup
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
import requests

# Specify URL to scrape
url = 'https://example.com'

# Send request to URL
response = requests.get(url)

# Parse HTML content
soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, 'html.parser')

# Extract data
title = soup.find('title').text
print('Title:', title)

topik.topik: Ekstraksi Data dengan BeautifulSoup dalam Web Scraping Python
topik.deskripsi: Menggunakan BeautifulSoup untuk menyederhanakan proses ekstraksi data dari HTML dalam web scraping dengan Python.

highlight: Python library used for web scraping purposes

error.deskripsi: ConnectionError occurred due to failed connection to specified URL.
error.solusi: Check internet connection and ensure correct URL is specified for web scraping.
